channel.title: Distributed Systems on Naman Balaji
channel.description: Recent content in Distributed Systems on Naman Balaji

item.title: Map Reduce
item.description: MapReduce: Simplified Data Processing on Large Clusters MapReduce is a programming model and an associated implementation for processing and generating large data sets. Users specify a map function that processes a key/value pair to generate a set of intermediate key/value pairs, and a reduce function that merges all intermediate values associated with the same intermediate key. Programs written in this functional style are automatically parallelised and executed on a large cluster of commodity machines.
